name: Happy Family Simulator Reality
description:
Do you like playing family games?? Do you like virtual reality games?? Do you like to play family simulator games?? Are you a fan of housekeeping?? If so then download the most fun virtual family game around which is this one!! This virtual reality virtual family games for family is full of fun activities you can perform with your virtual family in this game!!!
You have to create a happy virtual family in this game. After a marriage there will be a husband and a wife with their children and for a bonus have pets if you want. You can create all these images of a virtual family in your phone by simply with a touch and press of a download!!

The setting of the virtual family games is a virtual house with your virtual family members and you have to perform various family simulator tasks and family activities with your virtual family!! Each member has different family activity for themselves!!!
If it is the husband and dad simulator he has to drop the virtual family children to their school. He also has to play with the children as part of the family activity, he has to do all the masculine tasks of family activities in the virtual family simulator game!!

If it is the wife and mommy simulator she has to do the cooking and cleaning of the house!! She has to take care of her children and husband!! She also has to clean and tidy the messy house which is messy because of her virtual family children, she also has to be the housekeeper alongside her husband to do housekeeping family activities!!
And as for children, they have to play games with each other, make the house messy, go to school and help their parents with housekeeping and making the house tidy!!

The dad of the family simulator can also drive around for work and maybe go to market with mommy for virtual house grocery shopping!! Someone can do the cleaning of the kitchen and dishes and then someone can help take out the garbage or walk the pet in the virtual family games!!
All family activities are divided amongst the family!! All of these are housekeeping virtual family, family activities which the collective virtual family has to perform together!!

***GAME FEATURES OF THE AMILY SIMULATOR***
• Family simulator game with full virtual family members.
• Multiple levels including housekeeping tasks!!
• Many family activities for family simulator virtual family members to perform!!
• On screen joystick controls to help the family to perform family activities!!
• 3D simulation game!!
• HD graphics of simulation game!!
• Realistic features and special effects!!
• Home environment and neigborhood environment too!!
